name: rashid
bio: ”The Soaring Eagle of the Desert” that fights using parkour. With the wind as his ally, he outfoxes opponents with his high mobility. Born into nobility, he's a carefree but earnest man. Loves video streaming.
notlike: Fighting women and children,load times, trolls

moves.name: Standing Light Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

moves.name: Standing Medium Kick
moves.miscellaneous: 2 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

moves.name: Standing Heavy Kick
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponentForces a juggle state when the attack lands as a Punish Counter

moves.name: Crouching Light Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

moves.name: Crouching Light Kick
moves.miscellaneous: Can be rapid canceled

moves.name: Crouching Heavy Punch
moves.miscellaneous: 2 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

moves.name: Crouching Heavy Kick
moves.miscellaneous: Knockdown time extended when attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter

moves.name: Jumping Medium Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

moves.name: Jumping Heavy Punch
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent on the 2nd attack

moves.name: Jumping Heavy Kick
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a slam knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent when transitioning from Wing Stroke or Arabian Skyhigh

moves.name: Run
moves.miscellaneous:
Movement can be stoppped from frames 2 - 60Can transition to either a branching attack or forward jump from frames 8 - 60
5 frames of recovery added when movement is stopped
Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 60

moves.name: Backup
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 1 - 17

moves.name: Tempest Moon
moves.miscellaneous: Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 15Considered airborne from frames 6 - 21

moves.note: (from Run when coming in contact with an air current)
moves.name: [Air Current Boosted]Tempest Moon
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 20 - 35

moves.name: Flapping Spin
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent on the 1st attackCan be affected by air currents from frames 3 - 10

moves.name: Beak Assault
moves.miscellaneous: Can be affected by air currents from frames 4 - 25

moves.name: Crescent Kick
moves.miscellaneous: 3 frames of recovery added when the attack missesCan be affected by air currents from frames 6 - 19

moves.name: Blitz Strike
moves.miscellaneous:
Can transition to a mid-air special move from frames 12 - 23 when the attack hits or is blockedCan transition to any mid-air normal attack or special move from frame 24 until landing on the ground
Produces a floor bound when hitting a mid-air opponent

moves.name: Aerial Shot
moves.miscellaneous: Forces a juggle state when hitting a mid-air opponent

moves.name: Side Flip
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to Front Flip from frames 18 - 24Can be affected by air currents from frames 2 - 20

moves.name: Front Flip
moves.miscellaneous:
Considered airborne from frames 11 - 43Can transition to any mid-air normal attack, unique attack or special move from frame 22 - 40
Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 36

moves.name: L Spinning Mixer
moves.miscellaneous: Attack properties changed by air currents are active from frames 2 - 175 frames of recovery added when the attack misses

moves.note: (when coming in contact with an air current)
moves.name: [Air Current Boosted] L Spinning Mixer
M Spinning Mixer
moves.miscellaneous:
Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 6 - 10Considered airborne from frames 13 - 60
Attack properties changed by air currents are active from frames 2 - 9
11 frames of landing recovery can be canceled by a special move or Super Art when the attack hits

moves.note: (when coming in contact with an air current)
moves.name: [Air Current Boosted] M Spinning Mixer
moves.miscellaneous: Considered airborne from frames 10 -97

Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 6 - 12Considered airborne from frames 13 - 63

moves.name: [Air Current Boosted] H Spinning Mixer
moves.miscellaneous: Invincible to mid-air attacks from frames 6 - 12Considered airborne from frames 9 - 91

moves.miscellaneous: Completely invincible from frames 1 - 8Can be affected by air currents from frames 2 - 9

moves.name: [Air Current Boosted] OD Spinning Mixer
moves.miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frames 1 - 8Can transition to mid-air special moves from frames 67 - 71
Considered airborne from frames 10 - 97

moves.name: L Whirlwind Shot
moves.miscellaneous: Transition to variation attack by releasing the button between frames 29 and 48Transition to maximum attack version by holding the button for over 48 frames

moves.name: L Whirlwind Shot(Longest possible button hold)
moves.miscellaneous: After technique is finished, an air current that lasts 60 frames will be generated

moves.name: M Whirlwind Shot
moves.miscellaneous: Transition to variation attack by releasing the button between frames 29 and 48Transition to maximum attack version by holding the button for over 48 frames

moves.name: M Whirlwind Shot(Longest possible button hold)
moves.miscellaneous: After technique is finished, an air current that lasts 60 frames will be generated

moves.name: H Whirlwind Shot
moves.miscellaneous: Transition to variation attack by releasing the button between frames 29 and 48Transition to maximum attack version by holding the button for over 48 frames

moves.name: H Whirlwind Shot(Longest possible button hold)
moves.miscellaneous: After technique is finished, an air current that lasts 60 frames will be generated

moves.name: OD Whirlwind Shot
moves.miscellaneous: Transition to variation attack by holding the button for 36 frames

moves.name: OD Whirlwind Shot(Charged)
moves.miscellaneous: After technique is finished, an air current that lasts 60 frames will be generated

moves.name: L Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 21 - 22

moves.name: M Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 26- 27

moves.name: H Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 33 - 34

moves.name: OD Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous:
Can transition to branching attacks from frames 26 - 273 frames of recovery added when the attack is blocked
After technique is finished, an air current that lasts 60 frames will be generated

moves.name: Wing Stroke
moves.miscellaneous:
Considered airborne from frames 22 - 61Can transition to normal mid-air attacks from frames 32 - 51
Can be affected by air currents from frames 23 - 47

moves.name: Rolling Assault
moves.miscellaneous: Can transition to branching attacks from frames 17 - 20Can be affected by air currents from frames 8 - 25

moves.name: L Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous:
Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 13Can transition to any mid-air normal attack, unique attack or special move from frame 51 until landing on the ground
Can hit an opponent outside of a combo from frames 14 - 21

moves.name: M Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous:
Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 18Can transition to any mid-air normal attack, unique attack or special move from frame 59 until landing on the ground
Can hit an opponent outside of a combo from frames 19 - 26

moves.name: H Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous:
Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 21Can transition to any mid-air normal attack, unique attack or special move from frame 62 until landing on the ground
Can hit an opponent outside of a combo from frames 21 - 29

moves.name: OD Arabian Cyclone
moves.miscellaneous:
Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 13Can transition to any mid-air normal attack, unique attack or special move from frame 51 until landing on the ground only when the attack is blocked or misses
Can hit an opponent outside of a combo from frames 14 - 21

moves.name: SA1 Super Rashid Kick
moves.miscellaneous:
Invincible to strikes and throws from frames 1 - 16During the attack's active frames from frames 3 - 7 on hit, when the attack hits an airborne opponent, the properties change and damage is set to 1800
Considered airborne from frames 10 - 36
The minimum guaranteed damage is 30%
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter

moves.name: SA2 Ysaar
moves.miscellaneous:
An air current is generated during the attack's entire active frame duration and for 100 frames after the active frames are finishedYsaar becomes faster if Arabian Cyclone's first hit is collides with the attack during the active frames
The minimum guaranteed damage is 40%
Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter

moves.name: SA3 Altair
moves.miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frame 1 to frame 16.Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 50%.
Note: Can only be canceled into from special moves.

moves.name: CA Altair
moves.miscellaneous:
Completely invincible from frame 1 to frame 16.Values do not change when the attack lands as a counter or Punish Counter.
The minimum guaranteed damage is 50%.
Note: Can only be canceled into from special moves.

moves.name: Riding Glider
moves.miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

moves.name: Sunset Drop
moves.miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

moves.name: Desert Slider
moves.miscellaneous:
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter:- Deals 2040 damage
- Super Art gauge increases by 4000
- Forces a hard knockdown

moves.name: Forward Dash
moves.miscellaneous: Transitions to Run on frame 13Can be affected by air currents from frames 1 - 15

moves.name: Backward Dash
moves.miscellaneous: Invincible to throws from frame 1 to frame 15.

moves.name: Drive Impact: Eagle Edge
moves.miscellaneous:
Super Armor for 2 hits from frames 1 - 27Produces a wall splat if the pushback on hit causes the opponent to connect with the stage wall
Properties change to the following when the attack lands as a Punish Counter, or after the Super Armor absorbs a hit:
- Produces a crumple stun if the opponent is standing on the ground
- Forces a spinning knockdown when hitting a mid-air opponent
- Super Art gauge increases by 3000

moves.note: (When blocking or during a successful Drive Parry)
moves.name: Drive Reversal: Eagle Slash
moves.miscellaneous:
Recoverable damageCompletely invincible from frames 1 - 22
5 frames of recovery added on hit

moves.name: Drive Parry
moves.miscellaneous:
Can be canceled from the 4th frame via Drive RushParry hitbox is extended for as long as the buttons are held
Only blocks can be performed during the recovery period
Always in Punish Counter state during execution.

moves.name: Perfect Parry (strike)
moves.miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameFully invincible for 6 frames once recovery is over (invincibility not granted if you continue the parry)
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

moves.name: Perfect Parry (projectile)
moves.miscellaneous:
Perfect Parry activates when an attack is absorbed on the frame a parry is input, or on the next frameNo screen freeze occurs.
The player on the receiving end of a Perfect Parry cannot cancel and is forced into a Punish Counter state until their move is finished

moves.name: Parry Drive Rush
moves.miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 10th frameCan be canceled into an attack on the 9th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 24th frame

moves.name: Cancel Drive Rush
moves.miscellaneous:
Screen freeze occurs on the 9th frameCan be canceled into an attack from the 10th frame of the move
Can be canceled into actions other than a parry from the 25th frame

moves.name: SA1 Javelin of Marisa(Physical counter version)
L Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
M Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
H Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
OD Manège Doré(Attack changes according to Medal level)
L Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
OD Renversé(Attack changes according to Medal level)
Ransui Haze(3rd hit / longest possible delay)
